summary: Sickan has a new plan. This time, the gang are going to steal a small computer micro chip which contains a top secret plan of what the government intends to do with Sweden in the future. ... See full summary »
cast: Gösta Ekman|Ulf Brunnberg|Björn Gustafson|Birgitta Andersson|Carl Billquist|Per Grundén|Weiron Holmberg|Sten Ljunggren|Jan Waldekranz|Peter Harryson|Fredrik Ohlsson|Birger Malmsten|Jessica Zandén|Pia Green|Anna-Lotta Larsson|Charlie Elvegård|Gösta Engström|Leif Ahrle|Carl-Lennart Fröbergh
title: Jönssonligan får guldfeber
